I am calm, just pissed. I rarely post here and I never, ever shoot flames at trollbait anywhere, but this guy just rubbed me the wrong way. He makes a spoiler comment about the "spic" cop and then goes "how am I racist?" I bet you right now he's wearing a shirt that says "U Mad Bro?". I understand TPB comments are no place to engage in the sort of fruitless idiocy it takes to debate with strangers on the internet. But I made an exception in this case because this guy is an exceptional combination of low IQ and bad manners.
